content.description:
"Erica's Arete" is well into the Rock Maze and stands over a downed tree with the roots placed perfectly for being impaled.  But, with a little work, the route is easily protected (i.e. pad covering the exposed roots). 

  Start under the arete on nice jugs and work directly over the arete line.  Use small pockets and perfect foot placements to reach up and left to a tiny edge.  Beautiful line.
content.protection: One or two pads, and a spotter.

content.description: Ericas Arete is a great problem and one that will test your finger strength and your deadpoint strength. There are 3 problems on this block. Ericas arÃªte (V7) being the hardest.
